metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1581 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
LXD before 2.0.2 uses world-readable permissions for /var/lib/lxd/zfs.imgwhen setting up a loop based ZFS pool, which allows local users to copy andread data from arbitrary containers via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lxc2 - 2.0.2-0ubuntu1~16.04.1
lxd - 2.0.2-0ubuntu1~16.04.1
lxd-client - 2.0.2-0ubuntu1~16.04.1
lxd-tools - 2.0.2-0ubuntu1~16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxd package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.2-0ubuntu1~16.04.1').
